Yeah, that‚Äôs right: Screw your fancy new PS5 Final Fantasies ‚Äî devout Final Fantasy 8 fan Phil Salvador decided to launch a website dedicated to what he views is the best Final Fantasy, one full of very funny articles and impassioned arguments. item.description: Image: Toho Studios Sweet Home has been restored in 4K, thanks to fans There would be no Resident Evil without Sweet Home, the 1989 Japanese horror movie directed by Kiyoshi Kurosawa, now better kno...
item.content:encoded: Image: Toho Studios Sweet Home has been restored in 4K, thanks to fans There would be no Resident Evil without Sweet Home, the 1989 Japanese horror movie directed by Kiyoshi Kurosawa, now better known for films like Cure, Pulse, and Creepy. Sweet Home had a huge influence on Capcom‚Äôs groundbreaking foray into survival horror, largely in part because the original Resident Evil began development as a remake of a video game based on Sweet Home. Thanks to video preservation group Kineko Video, you...

item.description: Image: Arrowhead Game Studios/Sony Interactive Entertainment Putting the friend back in friendly fire It was somewhere between my first tour of duty scrapping bots at Malevelon Creek and nuking Term...
item.content:encoded: Image: Arrowhead Game Studios/Sony Interactive Entertainment Putting the friend back in friendly fire It was somewhere between my first tour of duty scrapping bots at Malevelon Creek and nuking Termanids on Turing that it occurred to me that the Helldivers‚Äô secret weapon isn‚Äôt their mighty fleet or some fancy new weapon: It‚Äôs the camaraderie formed with other players when you‚Äôre fighting for a shared goal. The gameplay in Helldivers 2 heavily emphasizes cooperation between players without the ...

item.content:encoded: Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Game Freak/Nintendo, The Pok√©mon Company We also list the Wonder Ticket Timed Research so you can see for yourself Pok√©mon Go‚Äôs World of Wonders season has introduced a new mechanic: the Wonder Ticket. This $9.99 ticket will give you three Timed Research Task sets throughout the season, each with specialized rewards. It‚Äôs admittedly hard to say whether or not the Wonder Ticket is ‚Äúworth it,‚Äù since we don‚Äôt know what rewards that later tasks will give...

item.title: Distilled board game brings a big shot of strategy to the tabletop | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Charlie Hall/Polygon It‚Äôs not a drinking game, it‚Äôs a game about drinks Distilled, the new board game about making and selling spirits like whiskey and vodka, was among the most played demos ...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Charlie Hall/Polygon It‚Äôs not a drinking game, it‚Äôs a game about drinks Distilled, the new board game about making and selling spirits like whiskey and vodka, was among the most played demos at last year‚Äôs Gen Con. The multiplayer strategy game, designed and published by Paverson Games, isn‚Äôt a drinking game though. Instead, it‚Äôs a simulation of the art, science, and economics of making booze ‚Äî and it couldn‚Äôt have been published at a more opportune moment for American drinking culture....

item.description: Image: Capcom Should you play the original title? Yes. It‚Äôs both fun and affordable Dragon‚Äôs Dogma 2 could be one of 2024‚Äôs biggest games. Given the success of other recent fantasy adventure titles ...
item.content:encoded: Image: Capcom Should you play the original title? Yes. It‚Äôs both fun and affordable Dragon‚Äôs Dogma 2 could be one of 2024‚Äôs biggest games. Given the success of other recent fantasy adventure titles like Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3 and Elden Ring (not to mention, Capcom‚Äôs own stunning streak of great titles), the cult classic series may find a much bigger audience when it launches on March 22. In case Dragon‚Äôs Dogma is new to you, you might be wondering whether you should play the original game before the ...

item.content:encoded: Posted by Long Zhao, Senior Research Scientist, and Ting Liu, Senior Staff Software Engineer, Google Research An astounding number of videos are available on the Web, covering a variety of content from everyday moments people share to historical moments to scientific observations, each of which contains a unique record of the world. The right tools could help researchers analyze these videos, transforming how we understand the world around us. Videos offer dynamic visual content far more r...

item.content:encoded: Posted by Zheng Xu, Research Scientist, and Yanxiang Zhang, Software Engineer, Google Language models (LMs) trained to predict the next word given input text are the key technology for many applications [1, 2]. In Gboard, LMs are used to improve users‚Äô typing experience by supporting features like next word prediction (NWP), Smart Compose, smart completion and suggestion, slide to type, and proofread. Deploying models on users‚Äô devices rather than enterprise servers has advantages like lower...

item.title: Prompt Engineering: An Integrated Dream | KDnuggets
item.description: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just ano...
item.content:encoded: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just another internet pipe dream? Let's ditch the sensationalism and delve into the actual job market data to find out.
